name: Livelihoods
description: Livelihoods Venture is a social business that originates, designs and monitors large scale projects of natural ecosystem restoration, regenerative agriculture, agroforestry and rural energy, aiming to create sustainable ecological and social value.
business_model: Social business with cooperative model where investors are fully associated with investment decisions and fund governance

team.composition: Agronomists, foresters, rural development practitioners, carbon, M&E and finance experts

geographic_presence: Africa, Asia, Latin America and Europe

value_chain.description: Partners with large corporations that source raw material from agriculture or forestry to transform their supply chain
value_chain.focus: Address both poverty and sustainability issues with smallholder farmers

carbon_funds.name: Livelihoods Carbon Funds (LCF)
carbon_funds.description: Work with companies committed to becoming net zero
carbon_funds.service: Provide high quality carbon credits from Livelihoods projects

network: Large network of NGOs, suppliers, and public agencies
